name: A new path to full-time open source featuring Filippo Valsorda (The Changelog #533)
summary: After years of working for Google on the Go Team, Filippo Valsorda quit last year to experiment with more sustainable paths for open source maintainers. Good news, it worked! Filippo is now a full-time open source maintainer and he joins Jerod on this episode to tell everyone exactly how heâ€™s making the equivalent to h...
